title: Frame․io now offers a companion app for Apple TV and FiLMiC Pro integration
content:
The popular cloud-based collaborative video editing platform Frame.io, which is now part of Adobe, this week announced a series of updates for its users. For instance, the platform now has a companion app for Apple TV as well as integration with FiLMiC Pro.

more…

The post Frame․io now offers a companion app for Apple TV and FiLMiC Pro integration appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The popular cloud-based collaborative video editing platform Frame.io now has an app for Apple TV, as well as integration with FiLMiC Pro.
